function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Health risks associated with wastewater contamination and potential pathogen transmission, including from virus-infected feces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased single-use medical waste, misunderstanding about recycling practices, and rising use of packaging during the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of residential buildings to pandemic due to high-touch surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and lack of resources in quarantined buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in sense of loneliness during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on literature review and expert discussion may lead to biased or incomplete understanding of pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of relevant data sources may result in incomplete information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on specific green building certification systems may limit the consideration of alternative approaches to pandemic resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indicators related to residents’ health and safety may be beyond the scope of conventional sustainability pillars, creating a potential oversight in pandemic preparedness.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for pandemic requirements in sustainable design of living spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited knowledge on how green building certification systems gbcss address pandemic requirements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the long-term sustainability impact of the pandemic on built environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for virus propagation within residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced environmental outcomes due to waste generation and reduced recycling","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of human health on the quality of residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid global changes and adaptation of green building rating systems due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction activities may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of distinction between research and development may hinder effective organization of disease mitigation efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate emphasis on interdisciplinary collaboration may result in limited progress in disease mitigation strategies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation through ai-based triage systems leading to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks associated with the use of phone-based software for patient data collection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on blockchain for medication delivery leading to potential supply chain disruptions and errors.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ai algorithms for triaging covid-19 patients may not accurately classify patients into the three groups, leading to incorrect treatment and monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction or cessation of critical clinical services in healthcare settings can lead to delayed diagnosis and treatment of non-covid-19-related illnesses, increasing morbidity and mortality.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical crowding of patients in hospital premises and physical meetings can increase the risk of disease transmission, including covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technology for public health communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-reliance on ai and deep learning for disease diagnosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to alternative diagnostic and screening tests for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on accurate data collection and reporting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks of big data usage","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misuse of modeling studies for misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on extrapolation of classic infection-control and public health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of extreme quarantine measures and detailed contact tracing for the scale of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential ineffectiveness of traditional public-health strategies for tackling covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 due to increased contagion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and lack of physical distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled transmission and high infectious period","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent movements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Introduction of multiple measures simultaneously without clear evaluation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of travel bans in reducing covid-19 cases outside wuhan and hubei","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear replication of control measures and effectiveness outside china","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underreported cases of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large fraction of the population remains at risk of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of travel ban and emergency response leading to 744,000 confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate individual control measures during chinese spring festival holiday","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High incidence of confirmed cases in hubei and other provinces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Initial high case reproduction number r0 of 3.15","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of control measures on trajectory of the epidemic outside wuhan city","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in implementing emergency control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
